title: 2.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Write a pseudocode and JavaScript program to categorize the age of users based on a given range. The program will use the following age ranges:

Child: 0-12 years Teenager: 13-19 years Adult: 20-59 years Senior: 60 years and above

The program should prompt the user to enter the ages, categorize each age into the appropriate range, and then display the category.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
